title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
ted and gather her tools. You will have to pass the Performance Charisma check DC of 15, if you chose dialogue 4. If you succeed, Ghustil will want nothing to do with you. This completes Find the Githyanki Crèche.

Find the Githyanki Crèche Objectives

Lae'zel told us that the githyanki should be able to cure us, if we can find one of their crèches. Someone named Zorru should know more. We found Zorru. Lae'zel will want to speak with him.

Find a Githyanki Crèche
